result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domh
result.html: Ba mhaith liom bheith i mo shagart nuair a thiocfadh ann domhI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom ḃeiṫ i mo ẛagart nuair a ṫiocfaḋ ann doṁI'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: Cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
